forecast.headline: Midweek Magic Before Wild Weekend Winds
forecast.week_summary: Stunning conditions Thursday-Friday with glassy mornings perfect for Mettams Pool and South Beach snorkelling. Monday's a cracker too with 29°C and light winds. Avoid Tuesday's howling 32km/h winds - it'll be a washout.

days.one_liner: Cool 21°C start with moderate winds - early birds win at protected spots
days.pro_tip: High tide at 6pm perfect for Bathers Beach sunset drinks

days.one_liner: Absolute magic - glassy conditions and perfect 23°C temps across all beaches
days.pro_tip: Low tide at 12:49pm ideal for exploring Peters Pool reef

days.one_liner: Dream conditions - light 6km/h winds and 25°C, get in before weekend crowds
days.pro_tip: Perfect Friday arvo at Cottesloe - grab sunset beers before the weekend madness

days.one_liner: Windy Saturday - head to protected Leighton or City Beach groynes
days.pro_tip: Weekend warriors hit early - 15km/h winds kick in by 9am

days.one_liner: Solid 22km/h winds make it choppy - stick to calm southern beaches
days.pro_tip: High tide at 9:20am perfect for protected Hillarys harbour swimming

days.one_liner: Magnificent Monday - 29°C and calm seas, best day of the week!
days.pro_tip: Low tide at 4:10pm perfect for afternoon Mettams Pool session

days.one_liner: Brutal 32km/h winds and big waves - stay home or try protected Fremantle
days.pro_tip: Perfect day for indoor shopping at Hillarys or catch up on Netflix

best_snorkel.why: Perfect rating with glassy 10km/h winds and ideal visibility

best_beach.why: Stunning 29°C temps, light winds and fewer crowds than weekend

hidden_gem.why: Locals' secret with great snorkelling before weekend invasion

alerts: Tuesday danger day - 32km/h winds and 1m+ waves, avoid all water activities
Weekend winds pick up significantly - early morning sessions essential
forecast.fun_fact: Perth's sea breeze (Fremantle Doctor) is so reliable that early settlers could set their clocks by its daily arrival - usually between 11am-2pm in summer!
